org.mixare.lib.render

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mixare.lib.render.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    The Camera class uses the Matrix and MixVector classes to store information about camera properties like the view angle and calculates the coordinates of the projected point
